00020     template <typename... Types>
00021     class type_list final {
00022 
00023     };
00024 
00025     template <typename... Ts>
00026     constexpr size_t size(type_list<Ts...>) {
00027         return sizeof...(Ts);
00028     }
00029 
00030     template<typename T, typename... Ts>
00031     constexpr type_holder<T> front(type_list<T, Ts...>) {
00032         return {};
00033     }
00034 
00035     template<typename T, typename... Ts>
00036     constexpr type_list<Ts...> pop_front(type_list<T, Ts...>) {
00037         return {};
00038     }
00039 
00040     template <typename T, typename... Ts>
00041     constexpr type_list<T, Ts...> push_front(type_list<Ts...>, type_holder<T>) {
00042         return {};
00043     }
00044 
00045     template <typename... Ts1, typename... Ts2>
00046     constexpr type_list<Ts1..., Ts2...> concat(type_list<Ts1...>, type_list<Ts2...>) {
00047         return {};
00048     }
00049     template <typename T, typename... Ts>
00050     constexpr type_holder<T> back(type_list<Ts..., T>) {
00051         return {};
00052     }

00054     template <typename T, typename... Ts>
00055     constexpr bool contains(type_list<Ts...>) {
00056         return (... || std::is_same_v<T, Ts>);
00057     }
00058 
00059     template <typename T, typename... Ts>
00060     constexpr bool contains14(type_list<Ts...>) {
00061         constexpr bool bs[] = { std::is_same_v<T, Ts>... };
00062         bool result = false;
00063         for (bool b : bs)
00064             result |= b;
00065 
00066         return result;
00067     }
00068 
00069     template <typename T, typename... Ts>
00070     constexpr std::size_t find(type_list<Ts...> list) {
00071         constexpr bool bs[] = { std::is_same_v<T, Ts>... };
00072         constexpr size_t list_size = size(list);
00073 
00074         for (size_t i = 0; i < list_size; ++i) {
00075             if (bs[i])
00076                 return i;
00077         }
00078         return list_size;
00079     }
00080 
00081     template <typename T, std::size_t I, typename... Ts>
00082     constexpr std::size_t find_nth_of(type_list<Ts...> list) {
00083         constexpr bool bs[] = { std::is_same_v<T, Ts>... };
00084         constexpr size_t list_size = size(list);
00085         std::size_t index{ 0 };
00086         for (size_t i = 0; i < list_size; ++i) {
00087             if (bs[i]) {
00088                 if (index == I)
00089                     return i;
00090                 ++index;
00091             }
00092         }
00093         return list_size;
00094     }
00095 
00096     template <typename T, typename... Ts>
00097     constexpr std::size_t find_cxx20(type_list<Ts...>) {
00098         constexpr bool bs[] = { std::is_same_v<T, Ts>... };
00099         return std::find(bs, true) - bs;
00100     }
00101 
00102     template <template <typename...> typename F, typename... Ts>
00103     constexpr size_t find_if(type_list<Ts...>) {
00104         constexpr bool bs[] = { F<Ts>::value... };
00105         return std::find(bs, true) - bs;
00106     }
00107 
00108     template <typename F, typename... Ts>
00109     constexpr size_t find_if(type_list<Ts...> list, F f) {
00110         bool bs[] = { f(type_holder<Ts>{})... };
00111         /*return std::find(bs, true) - bs;*/ // available since cxx20
00112         constexpr size_t list_size = size(list);
00113 
00114         for (size_t i = 0; i < list_size; ++i) {
00115             if (bs[i])
00116                 return i;
00117         }
00118 
00119         return list_size;
00120     }
00121 
00122     template <template <typename...> typename F, typename... Ts>
00123     constexpr bool all_of(type_list<Ts...>) {
00124         return (... && F<Ts>::value);
00125     }
00126 
00127     template <template <typename...> typename F, typename... Ts>
00128     constexpr bool any_of(type_list<Ts...>) {
00129         return (... || F<Ts>::value);
00130     }
00131 
00132     template <template <typename...> typename F, typename... Ts>
00133     constexpr bool none_of(type_list<Ts...> list) {
00134         return !any_of<F>(list);
00135     }
00136 
00137     template<size_t I, typename... Ts>
00138     constexpr auto get_nth_type(type_list<Ts...>) {
00139         return type_holder<decltype(
00140             detail::get<std::make_index_sequence<I>>::extractor(static_cast<Ts*>(nullptr)...))>{};
00141     }
00142 
00143     template<size_t I, typename... Ts>
00144     using NthType = typename decltype(get_nth_type<I>(type_list<Ts...>{}))::Type;
00145 
00146     template <typename F, typename...Ts, std::size_t... Is>
00147     constexpr void for_each_impl(type_list<Ts...> list, F&& f, std::index_sequence<Is...>) {
00148         (f(get_nth_type<Is>(list)), ...);
00149     }
00150 
00151     template <typename... Ts, typename F>
00152     constexpr void for_each(type_list<Ts...> list, F&& f) {
00153         for_each_impl(list, std::forward<F>(f),
00154             std::make_index_sequence<size(list)>()
00155         );
00156     }
00157 
00158     template <typename T, typename... Ts>
00159     constexpr size_t index_of(type_list<Ts...>) {
00160         constexpr bool bs[] = { std::is_same_v<T, Ts>... };
00161         return std::count_if(bs, true);
00162     }
00163 
00164     template <typename... Ts>
00165     constexpr size_t largest_type_index(type_list<Ts...>) {
00166         constexpr std::array<std::size_t, sizeof...(Ts)> sizes{ sizeof(Ts)... };
00167         const auto it = std::max_element(std::begin(sizes), std::end(sizes));
00168         return std::distance(std::begin(sizes), it);
00169     }
00170 
00171     template <typename... Ts>
00172     constexpr auto largest_type(type_list<Ts...> list) {
00173         constexpr auto index = largest_type_index(list);
00174         return get_nth_type<index>(list);
00175     }
00176 
00177     template <typename... Ts>
00178     constexpr type_list<Ts...> make_type_list(type_holder<Ts>&&...) {
00179         return {};
00180     }
00181 }
